question:
You have received a letter from your bank, asking you to acknowledge receipt of a new bank card. However, the card was missing from the envelope. Write a letter to the bank's head office. In your letter:

explain why you are writing
express concern about the missing card
ask them what they intend to do
Begin your letter as follows: Dear ____,

You should write at least 150 words.
text: I have a savings bank account in your bank, my customer ID is-756481. My old debit card got expired last week and I have applied for a new one through your web portal. I have chosen my residential address for the delivery.
Unfortunately, yesterday I have received a welcome kit from the bank,but the new debit card was missing from it. There are high chances that it may be misplaced while delivering.

I have checked my account, till now no unauthentic transaction has been reported in it. I request you to kindly block this card as there is a high risk of misuse of it and I may lose my savings. Kindly issue me a new one and I will collect it from my home branch.
You are requested to look into the matter and do inform me about the action you have taken. Hoping to receive a response on utmost priority.
